alert.note: Alert for Chemung (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 2:40PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Chemung, southwestern Tioga and north central Bradford Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 240 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lowman, or near Elmira, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chemung, Elmira, Southport, Barton, Horseheads, Sayre, Waverly, Elmira Heights, Erin and Litchfield. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 near 52A, and between 54 and 61. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central New York...and northeastern Pennsylvania.
